posts.message:
yesterday i posted a question if somebody have stumbled on a website or a service that allow downloading a database such as what shodan is working on ,  by that i meant if there was a database with a complete scan to the whole ip v4/v6 of the internet , basically asking to be able to download the internet  :)

as no answer was given i started to search (sure i searched before posting  , only this time i searched deeper ) and stumbled on a website which offer exactly what i was looking for  , a downloadable database of the whole internet  , so i though of sharing that also ..

https://scans.io

now my only problem is being able to download one of these databases  , the smallest one i set my eyes on is 70G , so wish me luck & long life  :D
posts.caption: scans.io

posts.message: My team is working on building an SDK, and we are currently working on the documentation and code samples. Is there like common place now to host code samples? GitHub maybe?

posts.description: I keep reading everywhere that CSS is not case sensitive, but I have this selector .holiday-type.Selfcatering which when I use in my HTML, like this, gets picked up <div class="holiday-type

posts.message:
Hello all..I'd like to ask about somthing related to gps trackers.. if any one can help plz .
Is it a must to have a SIM  card in the device ?
If not I'd like to know how it works? ?
As I googeld it I found some devices working with a  Sim card and some without. . That's confusing me.. I mean  gps tracker devices not mobile phones. . Thnx in advance..
